plot: When he tries to win back his ex-girlfriend, a struggling scientist accidentally creates an unstoppable black hole in his parents' garage. Now he must race to save the world--or at least get his ex to call him back.
title: Love & Other Unstable States of Matter
plot_es: When he tries to win back his ex-girlfriend, a struggling scientist accidentally creates an unstoppable black hole in his parents' garage. Now he must race to save the world--or at least get his ex to call him back.
original_name: Love & Other Unstable States of Matter
